meta.description: Enhanced IOC set for demo and testing. Contains safe/example entries and fields for confidence, tags, and short notes.

hashes.note: Example SHA256 used for demo matches (ASCII or binary).
SHA256 of empty input — included to show handling of benign cases.

filenames.note: Exact filename match; useful for quick demo hits.
Double extension pattern often used to trick users.

filename_regex.note: Detects filenames that try to appear as PDFs but execute.
Common pattern for randomly-named payloads (hex-like names).

ips.note: TEST-NET-1 address used for safe demo.
Sample testnet IP (TEST-NET-2); used in examples.

domains.note: Demo domain for testing domain substring matches.
Obfuscated form (square-bracket dots) sometimes used in listings.

urls.note: Example URL used for content-based matching in text files.

mutexes.note: Example mutex name used by persistent samples; used for process-level triage.

yara_strings.note: Simple string used in test files; include for demo scanning.
Import name frequently appearing in injection/loader code; useful to surface in YARA rules.

notes.usage: This file is intended for demo/functional use. Real-world deployments should include vetted IOCs from trusted feeds and avoid publicizing operational addresses. Confidence values: high/medium/low. Tags help categorize indicators.
